mapper.select: SELECT AAA.* , IFNULL(BBB.CNT_READN, 0) AS CNT_READN FROM ( SELECT AA.* , BB.CHAT_SEQ , BB.CHAT_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT A.USER_PROFILE_IMG, B.CHATROOM_MEMBER, B.CHATROOM_SEQ FROM T_OTT_USER A , ( SELECT D.* FROM ( SELECT CHATROOM_SEQ , CASE WHEN CHATROOM_MEMBER1 = #{userId} THEN CHATROOM_MEMBER2 WHEN CHATROOM_MEMBER2 = #{userId} THEN CHATROOM_MEMBER1 END CHATROOM_MEMBER , CASE WHEN CHATROOM_MEMBER1 = #{userId} THEN CHATROOM_MEMBER1_YN WHEN CHATROOM_MEMBER2 = #{userId} THEN CHATROOM_MEMBER2_YN END CHATROOM_MEMBER_YN FROM T_OTT_CHATROOM WHERE CHATROOM_MEMBER1 = #{userId} OR CHATROOM_MEMBER2 = #{userId} ) D WHERE D.CHATROOM_MEMBER_YN = 'Y' ) B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.CHATROOM_MEMBER ) AA , ( SELECT C.CHATROOM_SEQ , C.CHAT_SEQ , C.CHAT_CONTENT FROM T_OTT_CHAT C , ( SELECT MAX(D.CHAT_SEQ) AS CHAT_SEQ , CHATROOM_SEQ FROM T_OTT_CHAT D GROUP BY D.CHATROOM_SEQ ) E WHERE C.CHATROOM_SEQ = E.CHATROOM_SEQ AND C.CHAT_SEQ = E.CHAT_SEQ ) BB WHERE AA.CHATROOM_SEQ = BB.CHATROOM_SEQ ) AAA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CHATROOM_SEQ , COUNT(CHAT_READYN) AS CNT_READN FROM T_OTT_CHAT WHERE CHAT_READYN = 'N' GROUP BY CHATROOM_SEQ ) BBB ON AAA.CHATROOM_SEQ = BBB.CHATROOM_SEQ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_OTT_CHAT (CHAT_SEQ, CHATROOM_SEQ, USER_ID, CHAT_RECEIVE_ID, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_RGSDATE, CHAT_READYN) VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.CHAT_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM T_OTT_CHAT A) , #{chatroomSeq}, #{userId}, #{chatReceiveId}, #{chatContent}, NOW(), 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE T_OTT_CHATROOM SET CHATROOM_MEMBER1_YN = CASE WHEN CHATROOM_MEMBER1 = #{userId} THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, CHATROOM_MEMBER2_YN = CASE WHEN CHATROOM_MEMBER2 = #{userId} THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE CHATROOM_SEQ = #{chatroomSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_OTT_CHATROOM (CHATROOM_SEQ, CHATROOM_MEMBER1, CHATROOM_MEMBER2, CHATROOM_CREATE, CHATROOM_MEMBER1_YN, CHATROOM_MEMBER2_YN) VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.CHATROOM_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM T_OTT_CHATROOM A), #{userId}, #{chatroomMember}, NOW(), 'Y', 'Y')
